original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhuñjamānā sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipanti …pe….
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁bhuñja mān ā ▁sabbaṃ ▁hatth aṃ ▁mukh e ▁pa kkhip anti ▁pe

original: “Na bhuñjamāno sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: ▁na ▁ bhuñj amāno ▁sabbaṃ ▁hatth aṃ ▁mukh e ▁pa kkhip issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti

original: Na bhuñjamānena sabbo hattho mukhe pakkhipitabbo.
analyzed: ▁na ▁bhuñja mān ena ▁sabb o ▁hatth o ▁mukh e ▁pa kkhip itabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca bhuñjamāno sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ bhuñj amāno ▁sabbaṃ ▁hatth aṃ ▁mukh e ▁pa kkhip ati ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
